title: Europeans also set to lose out from Boris Johnson's Brexit deal
text:
For Jean-Claude, a Belgian chocolatier with a quaint shop nestled in the cobbled labyrinth of Bruges, Brexit is merely a puzzle to trouble bureaucrats in Brussels.

Our fictional Belgian probably doesn’t see his income inescapably tied to the decision of 17.4 million Britons.

But Jean-Claude should know that while a damaging no-deal looks to have been averted, negotiators in Brussels have just signed off on a deal that will likely make him worse off.

Belgians are among those that would be most affected by a Brexit deal outside of Britain and Ireland, the UK in a Changing Europe estimated this week.
